  • ./
      • XtendWeb Nginx cluster control for cPanel
  • Source

XtendWeb Nginx cluster control for cPanel¶

XtendWeb automatically generates nginx configuration for deploying your web applications in cPanel for secure,faster and multi-server webApplication deployment.

Tip

Builtin Redis Full page caching for Wordpress and Drupal which are two of the most widely used CMS

Tip

Try Clustered HA cPanel hosting at one of our partners https://xtendweb.gnusys.net/Nginx_friendly_web_hosts.html

Tip

Read Why you should use XtendWeb instead of CloudLinux for your high paying enterprise customers https://xtendweb.gnusys.net/Why_XtendWeb.html
